description: Cheesy sourdough dippers pair perfectly with this vibrant tomato soup recipe. They're easy to make from scratch, and they'll hit the spot every time.
keywords: Cheesy Toast Dippers With Creamy Tomato Soup
name: Cheesy Toast Dippers With Creamy Tomato Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, to prepare the soup, heat olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat and sauté onion and garlic for 2-3 minutes or until almost starting to colour. Add tomatoes and vinegar and simmer for 5 minutes. Transfer to a blender or use a handheld blender to blitz until smooth. Season with pepper. Pour into bowls and dollop with yoghurt, sprinkle with basil and serve with cheesy dippers.
